Queries.GetJounalEntrysHead:
SELECT DISTINCT A.TransId
FROM JDT1 A LEFT JOIN OJDT B ON A.TransId=B.TransId WHERE A.RefDate BETWEEN '20210101' AND '20231231' AND U_BO_SocioNegocio IS NULL AND A.TransType IN('13','16','24','59','60','202') ORDER BY 1
Queries.GetJounalEntrysLines:
SELECT A.TransId, A.Line_ID, A.Account, CASE WHEN A.TransType IN('202','60', '59') THEN (SELECT TOP 1 U_BO_Dflt_CardCode FROM [@BO_CONFIG]) WHEN A.TransType IN('16') THEN (SELECT TOP 1 CardCode FROM ORDN WHERE TransId = A.TransId) WHEN A.TransType IN('24') THEN (SELECT TOP 1 CardCode FROM ORCT WHERE TransId = A.TransId) WHEN A.TransType IN('13') THEN (SELECT TOP 1 CardCode FROM OINV WHERE TransId = A.TransId) ELSE U_BO_SocioNegocio END AS "U_BO_SocioNegocio", A.TransType
FROM JDT1 A LEFT JOIN OJDT B ON A.TransId=B.TransId WHERE A.RefDate BETWEEN '20210101' AND '20231231' AND U_BO_SocioNegocio IS NULL AND A.TransType IN('13','16','24','59','60','202')
